scripts.dev: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); if (process.getuid() !== 0 && !process.env.DOCKER) { spawnSync('sudo', ['tsx', 'watch', 'src/start-dev.ts'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { spawnSync('tsx', ['watch', 'src/start-dev.ts'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
scripts.start: node -e "const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); if (process.getuid() !== 0 && !process.env.DOCKER) { spawnSync('sudo', ['node', 'dist/index.js'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { spawnSync('node', ['dist/index.js'], { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
